description: Papua New Guinea, State of Emergency Controller David Manning has issued a curfew for the National Capital District, Central and Western Provinces. Effective April 16 until April 30, unless extended by the Emergency Controller.

description: The provincial government of Enga in Papua New Guinea has allocated K8 million to prevent Covid-19 from entering the province, on May 17, 2020.
